DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform 12-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety Eriobotyra Japonica Lindley Extract improvement Cognitive Function . The investigator measure improvement Cognitive Function parameter , include K-MMSE , Ability perform work memory task , CNT BCRS , monitor blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Eriobotyra Japonica Lindley Extract Improvement Cognitive Function
